market_summary: E-commerce is shifting strongly towards Social Commerce and Hyper-personalization.

trends.description: Smart product recommendations, 24/7 sales chatbots, automated behavioral email marketing.
Direct purchasing on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and live stream selling.
Decoupled frontend and backend for flexible display on all devices (IoT, Mobile, Web).
Users prioritize green products, recycled packaging, and transparent sourcing.

user_expectations: One-touch payment (Apple Pay, Google Pay, QR Code).

market_summary: SaaS is saturating, shifting towards Vertical SaaS (niche industries) and Product-Led Growth (PLG).

trends.description: Product sells itself via Freemium model, self-service onboarding without sales requirement.
Pay-as-you-go based on actual usage instead of flat subscription (like AWS, Snowflake).
AI integration for summarization, content generation, data analysis within the app.
Specialized solutions for niche industries (Dental, Construction, Restaurants) instead of All-in-one.

user_expectations: Simple UX, no complex training needed.
Native integration with popular tools (Slack, Zapier).

market_summary: Online education is shifting from long videos to Micro-learning and interactive experiences (Gamification).

trends.description: Lessons broken down into 5-10 minutes, easy to consume on mobile.
Leaderboards, badges, streaks to increase learning motivation.
Group learning with live interaction and specific deadlines instead of self-paced.

market_summary: Embedded Finance and Neo-banking are changing how users manage money.

trends.description: Integrating financial services (loans, insurance, payments) into non-financial apps (Grab, Shopee).
Installment payments, popular with Gen Z.
AI analyzes spending and suggests smart savings.

user_expectations: Friendly UI/UX, not dry like traditional banks.

market_summary: Digital healthcare with Telemedicine and Wearables for continuous health monitoring.

trends.description: Remote consultation integrated with electronic health records.
Connecting blood pressure monitors, glucose meters, heart rate monitors to the app.
Meditation, psychotherapy, and mood tracking apps.
